name: Memories Off 6: T-Wave
synopsis: Memories Off 6 ~T-wave~ is a visual romantic adventure novel based on the concept of 'Return to Origin'! The story in ~T-wave~ revolves around the locations used for the first series of Memories Off: Sumisora City and Sumisora Benzai-ten (a historical shrine located 20 minutes walk from Sumisora station). Play as one of 5 heroines, including Ririsu Tohmine who is a childhood friend of the main character. Full voice acting! Writing talent such as Chabo Higurashi, Hiro Akizuki, Dai-san-gen, Hiroaki Miura, Takuya Baba and Yayoi Sawatari all contributed to the scenario development! Musical score by Takeshi Abo. Character design by Takayuki Koshimizu and Yukihiro Matsuo! More than 25 hours of gameplay! An engrossing experience for both 'Memories Off' veterans and newcomers to the series!
